title: Military Industrial Complex - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/6/19
itunes:title: Military Industrial Complex - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/6/19
description:
George Noory and professor Dan Kovalik explore the history of the United States military getting involved in conflicts in the Middle East and other regions for natural resources, and whether there will be a war with Iran when most Iranians like America.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
